title._content: Marion Post Wolcott with Rolleiflex and Speed Graphic in hand in Montgomery County, Maryland (LOC)

description._content: Rothstein, Arthur,, 1915-1985,, photographer. Marion Post Wolcott with Rolleiflex and Speed Graphic in hand in Montgomery County, Maryland 1940 Jan. 1 negative : safety ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 inches or smaller. Notes: Captions for published images of negative may state that the photograph was taken in Vermont. The barn in the background also appears in LC-USF34-29237-D. The caption card for that image states that the barn is in Montgomery County, Maryland. Title devised by cataloger based on information from Reference Aid no. 212 and on caption card for LC-USF34-29237-D. Transfer; United States. Office of War Information. Overseas Picture Division. Washington; 1944. Subjects: Wolcott, Marion Post,--1910-1990,--photographer. United States--Maryland--Montgomery County. Format: Safety film negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions. For information, see U.S. Farm Security Administration/Office of War Information Black & White Photographs www.loc.gov/rr/print/res/071_fsab.html Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, DC 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Farm Security Administration - Office of War Information Photograph Collection More information about the FSA/OWI Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.fsaowi Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.00195 Call Number: LC-USF34- 029245-D
